actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-878.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on House Administration to provide for the maintenance and improvement of ongoing computer services for the House of Representatives, for the investigation of additional computer services for the House of Representatives, and to provide computer support to the committees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on House Administration to incur further expenses to enable House Information Systems to develop, operate, maintain, and improve computer services for the House of Representatives, and to give computer support directly to committees, Members, and administrative officers of the House. Sets forth specific funding levels for computer support services for certain committees and for Members and officers of the House.

titles.title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on House Administration to provide for the maintenance and improvement of ongoing computer services for the House of Representatives, for the investigation of additional computer services for the House of Representatives, and to provide computer support to the committees of the House of Representatives.
